text: I'll be happy to upgrade but I don't know what changed.
title: No release notes for 0.7.1.

text:
@thedrow my apologies, it was released quite hastily to fix a few errors downstream. The only change in 0.7.1 compared to 0.7.0 is that I put the oauthlib.common.log object back in. While this is not really meant to be used by others it seems it was :)

0.7.0 includes quite a few changes however and its mostly documented in the changelog file https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/blob/master/CHANGELOG.rst
